short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The browser extension for seamless, page-specific note-taking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notan is the simplest chrome extension for enhancing your browsing experience through efficient note-taking.

You'll never have to worry where you saved a note again with Notan. The extension allows you to write down notes, add tags to them, and search them up blazingly fast. Now you don't have to spend countless hours organizing and managing where to save your notes.
